did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Included are genealogical notes regarding the Gowdy family. The majority of the papers consist of Samuel Gowdy's descendants beginning with Robert and Content Gowdy; Hill Gowdy, son of Samuel; Alexander Gowdy and others not of the Samuel Gowdy branch; and duplicate material and items to be looked up and connected.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mahlon Myron Gowdy was born in 1864 in Somers, Conn. and died on January 11, 1963 at the age of 98 in Providence, R.I.
Source: "Former Resident Dies at Age 98." Hartford Courant, 1963 January 13, 31A1.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Included are genealogical notes regarding the Gowdy family. The majority of the papers consist of Samuel Gowdy's descendants beginning with Robert and Content Gowdy; Hill Gowdy, son of Samuel; Alexander Gowdy and others not of the Samuel Gowdy branch; and duplicate material and items to be looked up and connected.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: A family history comprising the surnames of Gade--Gadie--Gaudie--Gawdie--Gawdy--Gowdy--Goudey--Gowdey--Gauden--Gaudern--and the variant forms, from A. D. 800 to A. D. 1919. Compiled from authentic public and private records .. embracing a compendium of family history, genealogy and biography covering a period of eight hundred years. Supplemented by an appendix of gleanings ... illustrated with portraits, views of family seats ... By Hon. Mahlon M. Gowdy ... and edited by Rev. G. T. Ridlon .
Gowdy, Gowdie family : History and Genealogy Unit Special Genealogical File, circa 1816

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The papers came to the Connecticut State Library on July 28, 1978, from Ms. Barbara A. Hulburt on behalf of the Gowdy Family Association.
